abstract_summ: To investigate metabolic effects of SARS-COV-2 infection, we evaluated serum metabolites of COVID-19 patients (n = 33; diagnosed by nucleic acid testing) We found altered tryptophan metabolism into the kynurenine pathway, which regulates inflammation and immunity . Widespread dysregulation of nitrogen metabolism was also seen in infected patients . Increased circulating levels of glucose and free fatty acids were also observed .
